Nitrobenzene + Oxygen + 2 H+ gives Catechol + Nitrite
Salicylate + NADH + Oxygen + H+ gives 2,5-Dihydroxybenzoate + NAD+ +
Salicylate + NADPH + Oxygen + H+ gives 2,5-Dihydroxybenzoate + NADP+ +
Lipoyl-AMP + Apoprotein gives Protein N6-(lipoyl)lysine + AMP

Reaction.name: biochanin A,NADPH:oxygen oxidoreductase (3'-hydroxylating)
Reaction.definition: Biochanin A + Oxygen + NADPH + H+ gives Pratensein + NADP+ + H2O
